Save money on your next shopping trip! Find all the best deals, BOGOs and offers picked just for you. Then save even more by loading digital coupons to your Plenti card.
 
·         View our Weekly Ad for the best deals across the store
·         Get inspired with new seasonal recipes and time saving tips in Flavor magazine
·         Log in with your Plenti account to see deals and offers picked just for you
·         Browse and activate digital coupons for even bigger savings
·         View your Plenti points balance and activate Plenti offers to earn more points
·         Quickly access a digital version of your Plenti card to scan at the checkout
·         Add deals you find to the shopping list so they don't get forgotten
·         Find store details and opening hours with the store locator

We made some performance enhancements and bug fixes for a better experience, and added support for iPhone X.
We made some performance enhancements and bug fixes for a better experience, and added support for iPhone X.

We heard you! SE Grocers rewards is here. Register for SE Grocers rewards from the app and view points balance and history. Plus, use the digital rewards card at checkout for seamless shopping. We've even made some performance enhancements and bug fixes for a better in-app experience.

We heard you! SE Grocers rewards is here. Register for SE Grocers rewards from the app and view points balance and history. Plus, use the digital rewards card at checkout for seamless shopping. We've even made some performance enhancements and bug fixes for a better in-app experience.
We made some performance enhancements and bug fixes for a better experience.
We made some performance enhancements and bug fixes for a better experience.

We have made updates to the log in process. If you signed up for Winn-Dixie rewards with a home phone number, log in to the website at www.winndixie.com/myaccount to update your account to a mobile number. (Don’t forget to hit SAVE!) Then you can log in to the app easily using your mobile number. If you have any questions, please let us know at DigitalSupport@segrocers.com – Happy Shopping!

We have made updates to the log in process. If you signed up for Winn-Dixie rewards with a home phone number, log in to the website at www.winndixie.com/myaccount to update your account to a mobile number. (Don’t forget to hit SAVE!) Then you can log in to the app easily using your mobile number. If you have any questions, please let us know at DigitalSupport@segrocers.com – Happy Shopping!
We squished some bugs and cleaned up a few messes. Check to see if you earned a Mystery Bonus on your next shop, we’ve cleaned up a few things there too!

We made some background refinements to improve your app experience and made a few visual updates. Be sure to watch your Mystery Bonus for more special point multipliers in the future!

We made some background refinements to improve your app experience and added some new ways for you to find deals. Remember to keep an eye on your Mystery Bonus for special point multipliers!

This update brings an updated Weekly Ad experience, with an improved ad view and background updates ready for future enhancements! We also made a number of small improvements, such as auto-scrolling of the home page banner and a new custom sound for push notifications. We have lots of exciting new features coming, so keep an eye out for new updates!

This update brings an updated Weekly Ad experience, with an improved ad view and background updates ready for future enhancements! We also made a number of small improvements, such as auto-scrolling of the home page banner and a new custom sound for push notifications. We have lots of exciting new features coming, so keep an eye out for new updates!

We’ve updated how to log into the Winn-Dixie app! You can now log in with an email and password or with your cell number and a verification code, as before. We also updated the Points History to show when you earn points through our e-commerce partners and continued our efforts to improve the app’s speed and reliability. We have more exciting features coming soon, so be sure to watch for new updates!

We’ve updated how to log into the Winn-Dixie app! You can now log in with an email and password or with your cell number and a verification code, as before. We also updated the Points History to show when you earn points through our e-commerce partners and continued our efforts to improve the app’s speed and reliability. We have more exciting features coming soon, so be sure to watch for new updates!

The shopping list is here! You’ve been waiting and we’ve been working, but it’s here in time for your Thanksgiving shopping! The new shopping list lets you search for items to add to your list, keep track of coupons and deals from the Weekly Ad, and then save separate lists for different shopping trips. Now you can keep your Thanksgiving shopping saved in one list, while your weekly shopping stays separate and organized! This is just the start and we have lots more features coming for the shopping list in the future, so keep an eye out for more updates.
 
We’ve also introduced a push notification inbox so that you can keep track of deals and other exciting offers, and we’ve added Spanish language support based on the language set on your phone. 
 
This update cleans up a few bugs to make sure your experience is a smooth one.

We’ve made updates to reduce crashes experienced by a small number of users, along with several performances improvements and improved crash reporting.
We’ve made updates to reduce crashes experienced by a small number of users, along with several performances improvements and improved crash reporting.

Plan, shop & save right from your phone. Cruise the aisles with confidence knowing you’re getting the best deals on exactly what you need. With our app, you can View Digital coupons, the weekly ad and add deals right to your shopping list. We’ve also made some performance improvements, fixed a few bugs and made a couple design updates. Get ready to save more and shop smarter.

Plan, shop & save right from your phone. Cruise the aisles with confidence knowing you’re getting the best deals on exactly what you need. With our app, you can View Digital coupons, the weekly ad and add deals right to your shopping list. We’ve also made some performance improvements, fixed a few bugs and made a couple design updates. Get ready to save more and shop smarter.

We’ve redesigned the Home page to improve the look, add new personalized features, and make it easier to find important information like your store’s hours. Watch out soon for even more features to help you save!
 
In addition, we’ve upgraded the security of the app’s login process. This change will require users to log back into the app.

We’ve redesigned the Home page to improve the look, add new personalized features, and make it easier to find important information like your store’s hours. Watch out soon for even more features to help you save!
 
In addition, we’ve upgraded the security of the app’s login process. This change will require users to log back into the app.

Take a look at the all-new rewards screen and the new recipes page! We’ve moved all of the wallet features into a dedicated card that you can access from almost anywhere in the app so that we can consolidate all the rewards features in one place. You’ll now find your Mystery Bonus on the new rewards page, where you can activate, deactivate, or switch your Mystery Bonus as you like! The Mystery Bonus also now automatically applies at the checkout when you scan your rewards barcode. Keep an eye on that new page for exciting new ways to save!

We also introduced a new Recipes page, where you can find all kinds of delicious new meals and snacks to make with your favorite SE Grocers products! Search by meal, sort to fit your dietary needs, or filter by the most popular recipes to find something great. We’ll be regularly adding new recipes for you to try, so check back often!

Search by meal, sort to fit your dietary needs, or filter by the most popular recipes to find something great. We’ll be regularly adding new recipes for you to try, so check back often!

We’ve added more ways for you to find products you love and save money on them! Check out Buy it again for quick access to some of your most often purchased items, and Picked for you to find savings customized just for you. Then take a look at the new More tab, where we’ll be adding exciting new features, like Recipes!

We’ve made some updates to fix a few log in issues reported by our users. We’re working to improve our customer’s experience in the app and will have some more improvement releases out in the near future.
